entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -22.3°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -25.2°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
